price: [saying], “Hand over to me the slaves of Allah[5]. I am indeed a trustworthy messenger to you,
arabic: أَنۡ أَدُّوٓاْ إِلَيَّ عِبَادَ ٱللَّهِۖ إِنِّي لَكُمۡ رَسُولٌ أَمِينٞ
